config.query: SELECT STORE_CD AS SITE_ID, "NAME", ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, STATE, POSTALZIP, CAST(LATITUDE AS NUMBER(10,7)) AS LATITUDE, CAST(LONGITUDE AS NUMBER(10,7)) AS LONGITUDE, FULLFILL AS FULFILL_STATUS, PICKUP AS PICKUP_STATUS, STORELOOKUP AS STORELOOKUP_STATUS, DEPT27FF AS DEP27_FULFILL_STATUS, LASTMODIFIEDDATE FROM ELCAT.STORELISTING
